title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why it's time for everyone to admit he was 100% right about Baker Mayfield from the beginning after reports about Cleveland moving on from the quarterback surface. He shares why Russell Wilson wanted out of Seattle and what it has to do with head coach Pete Carroll. He also takes a look at the quarterback landscape around the NFL and why it's more balanced than you think. Plus, Villanova head coach Jay Wright joins the show to talk about their chances to win a 3rd National Championship. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
